dark_flame.bed.stopSleep: You can't sleep right now. It hungers.
dark_flame.no_consent.disconnect: please accept to use this mod
gui.dark_flame.consent.title:
By clicking "accept" you 
agree to the following terms:
gui.dark_flame.consent.ip:
- Your IP address may be used 
to get your location
gui.dark_flame.consent.system_vars:
- System variables may be read 
to get your real name (windows)
gui.dark_flame.consent.outside_interacti:
- This mod may interact with your 
computer outside of Minecraft
 for more information, see
https://github.com/QBicMC/DarkFlame
gui.dark_flame.consent.note:
Note: this data is shared with 
the server, so make sure 
you trust the server owner. 
If not, activate streamer mode
gui.dark_flame.consent.tooltip_streamer_: Activating streamer mode will hide your real name and location, using your minecraft name instead
gui.dark_flame.consent.tooltip_consent: I consent to this data being used in the context of this mod
